divs: sighting detailsok, well, here i go. twice in as many months i have seen something in the sky at night. the first time i kinda just blew it off but i saw what i believe is the same thing\kind of flying object & maybe it can be explained. now, i know what airplanes look like in the night sky & sound like, this was not a plane. it was a white light that at first glance i thought to be a really bright star or planet, until it started moving. the first time it passed over head & i fully expected to see the blinky plane lights & sounds that accompany them, no i did not. it was silent. it passed over with no sound & no change in the light, it remained fully bright coming & going. i saw it last night too, this time going west to east, first time north to south. but last night it was moving sloooooowly. i gauge the speed from where it shows up between the trees, planes have a pretty regular speed, this was slow. both events were benign, i didn't freak out & my heart didn't race. once & i wouldn't be here posting this, but this happened twice. i don't know what it was, as i stated i know what airplanes look like, i see them every night, this was not a plane. being in the southeast lower part of michigan, the tri-county area around detroit, i am wondering if anyone saw it & if you know what it could be, im all for an earthly explanation. thanks in advance.
